price: And We gave him Isaac, and then Jacob, a grandson, and We made all of them righteous.
arabic: وَوَهَبۡنَا لَهُۥٓ إِسۡحَٰقَ وَيَعۡقُوبَ نَافِلَةٗۖ وَكُلّٗا جَعَلۡنَا صَٰلِحِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
